mapper.insert: insert into address (id, user_id, user_nick_name, phone, receiver, province, city, area, address, postcode, default_address, creator, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultAddress,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update address set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_nick_name = #{userNickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default_address = #{defaultAddress,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, user_nick_name, phone, receiver, province, city, area, address, postcode, default_address, creator, create_time, update_time from address where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
